Package io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.adapter

Implementations of Random backed by instances of SplittableRandom.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseSplittableRandomAdapter
    Abstract BaseSplittableRandomAdapter class.
    DirectSplittableRandomAdapter
    Abstract DirectSplittableRandomAdapter class.
    ReseedingSplittableRandomAdapter
    A version of SplittableRandomAdapter that uses a RandomSeederThread to replace each seederThread's SplittableRandom with a reseeded one as frequently as possible, but not more frequently than it is being used.
    SingleThreadSplittableRandomAdapter
    SingleThreadSplittableRandomAdapter class.
    SplittableRandomAdapter
    Thread-safe version of SingleThreadSplittableRandomAdapter.
    SplittableRandomReseeder
    Utility class to re-seed a SplittableRandom instance using reflection and Unsafe.putLongVolatile(Object, long, long).

Package io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.adapter Description

Implementations of Random backed by instances of SplittableRandom.
